Package geometrics

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometrics.Rectangle
  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object

    A class for Rectangles in 2D vector space.

    An Object of the Rectangle class describes elements that could be mirrored to an graphical Interface inside a 2D space. Furthermore the class provides methods to calculate anchor points, areas and collisions between objects of rectangles.

    Version:
    01.00 (current)

    Version history:

    • Version: 01.00: Create Rectangle class as standalone solution for mirroring 2D Java Swing graphics inside a frame.
    Author:
    Ingo Möller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Rectangle​(double width, double height)
      Creates a new Rectangle with given width and height on location (0, 0)
      Rectangle​(double sx, double sy, double ex, double ey)
      Creates a new Rectangle with given coordinates start(x, y), end(x, y) : (sx, sy, ex, ey).
      Rectangle​(Vector2D location, double width, double height)
      Creates a new Rectangle with given values.
      Rectangle​(Vector2D startPoint, Vector2D endPoint)
      Creates a new Rectangle defined by two Vector2D.

        public Rectangle​(Vector2D startPoint,
                 Vector2D endPoint)
        Creates a new Rectangle defined by two Vector2D.
        Parameters:
        startPoint - Starting point on top-left
        endPoint - Ending point on bottom-right

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle​(double sx,
                 double sy,
                 double ex,
                 double ey)
        Creates a new Rectangle with given coordinates start(x, y), end(x, y) : (sx, sy, ex, ey).
        Parameters:
        sx - Start coordinate (x)
        sy - Start coordinate (y)
        ex - End coordinate (x)
        ey - End coordinate (y)

    • Method Detail

      • area

        public double area​(double width,
                   double height)
        Calculates the rectangle area by with and height.

        Note: Basic geometric operation on Rectangle.

        Parameters:
        width - Rectangle width
        height - Rectangle height
        Returns:
        The area calculates by rectangle width and height

      • area

        public double area​(Vector2D endPoint)
        Calculates the rectangle area by location and a given end point.

        Note: Basic geometric operation on Rectangle.

        Parameters:
        endPoint - End point of rectangle as Vector2D
        Returns:
        The area calculates by location and end position from rectangle
